			                    Metastatic Parathyroid Cancer
			                    Treatment of metastatic parathyroid cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (metastasectomy) to remove cancer from the places where it has spread.    - Surgery followed by radiation therapy.    - Radiation therapy.    -  Chemotherapy.     -  Supportive care to treat hypercalcemia (too much calcium in the blood).
